## Token class

Standard token or cryptocurrency.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Token 
```

## Example


```jsx
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/solana";

const sdk = ThirdwebSDK.fromNetwork("devnet");
sdk.wallet.connect(signer);

// Get the interface for your token program
const program = await sdk.getToken("{{contract_address}}");
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [balance()](./solana.token.balance.md) |  | Get the token balance of the connected wallet |
|  [balanceOf(walletAddress)](./solana.token.balanceof.md) |  | Get the token balance of the specified wallet |
|  [getMetadata()](./solana.token.getmetadata.md) |  | Get the metadata for this token including the name, supply, and decimals. |
|  [mint(amount)](./solana.token.mint.md) |  | Mints the specified amount of new tokens |
|  [totalSupply()](./solana.token.totalsupply.md) |  | Get the total minted supply of this token |
|  [transfer(receiverAddress, amount)](./solana.token.transfer.md) |  | Transfer the specified amount of tokens to another wallet |
